name: Cantrip
summary: Battle, build your deck and earn new cards in this roguelite where your hand is your health: if you get hit when you don't have any cards, it's game over. If you prevail, however, you get to draft new cards for your deck before moving on to the next fight.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Cantrip - Battle, build your deck and earn new cards in this roguelite card battle game!
